channel.title: Gitalk on Jane - A super concise theme for Hugo

item.title: Gitalk config error
item.description: Issue When configurating this blog’s comment function, an error shows up. Error message: “Error: u.concat(…).join is not a function” Analysis I’m pretty sure that his issue is rare and can be solved as I don’t find much information online. One related post is the git project of Gitalk and a closed issue submit by the author. Unfortunately, he just solved it with no clues. Gitalk issue#114 Causes and solutions After searching and investigating error messages in Chrome developer tool, I located the error in configuration.
